name: Slime in Space
description:
This is my first game i ever published online so I hope you like it.I spent a lot of time desinging and makeing game so it should be ok.You can suggest anything you would like added in game and I will cosidere it!

The game is about slime that travels from planet to planet.The game does not have a specific goal.

Its rage type of game and if you fail on just one level you will be forsed to satrt over from first level of planet you are currenty on.You can earn coins by compleating levels and with tham you can bye skins and powers from shop.

NOTE:Game is in development so there is a lot of unfinished planets and meny things...

You can also follow my social media

Instagram

YouTube
